cast.name: 阿列克谢·沃罗别夫 Alex Sparrow
伊万·阿赫洛贝斯金 Ivan Okhlobystin
亚历山大·斯莫勒克 Aleksandr Samoylenko
阿列克塞·古斯科夫 Aleksei Guskov
柳西亚·切博蒂纳 Lyusya Chebotina
玛丽娜·沃罗齐什切娃 Marina Vorozhishcheva
瓦列里娅·费奥多罗维奇 Valeriya Fedorovich

introduction: As a result of another outrage by fans of the England national team, which escalated into multi-day clashes, the leadership of European football disqualifies the English from the European Football Cup. Instead, the Russian team enters the final stage. The Russian Football Federation has only two weeks to assemble a team. Head coach Sorokin and his assistant Mikhalych invite to the team the football players who have today become "downed pilots": forwards Matveev and Sanaev are under investigation for a fight, defender Bushagov, after a loud scandal, is divorcing his wife, who demands huge alimony, young forward Kizyakov because of of his character sits on a bench and so on. They all lost the opportunity to play, earn big money, be idols and real stars. But Sorokin's plan - to give them a chance to return to their former life - does not work: the new team cannot work together, each player pursues his own goals, and therefore they do not form a team.
